alert.note: Alert for Hamilton; Herkimer (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albany (Eastern New York and Western New England)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued September 07 at 6:56PM EDT until September 07 at 8:00PM EDT by NWS Albany
info.description: The National Weather Service in Albany has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Hamilton County in eastern New York... Southern Herkimer County in eastern New York... * Until 800 PM EDT. * At 656 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Utica, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Ohio, Newport, Middleville, Poland, Cold Brook, Russia, Norway, West Frankfort, Nobleboro, Harbor, Farrel Corner, Wilmurt Corners, Morehouseville, Norwich Corners, Hurricane, Stewart Corners, Old City, Grant, Gray and Powley Place. Please report hail size...damaging winds and reports of trees down to the National Weather Service by email at Alb.Stormreport@noaa.gov... On Facebook at www.facebook.com/nwsalbany or twitter @nwsalbany HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
